actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to add mileage to the Interstate System for a route from Chicago, Illinois, to Kansas City, Missouri.

summary.text: Authorizes additional mileage to the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways for construction of a highway between Chicago, Illinois, to Kansas City, Missouri. Authorizes appropriations in such amounts as may be necessary out of the Highway Trust Fund to construct such highway.

titles.title: A bill to add mileage to the Interstate System for a route from Chicago, Illinois, to Kansas City, Missouri.
